mapper.insert: insert into basic_purviewuser (pkid, userid, createtime, modulepurviews, menupurviews,itempurviews) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modulepurviews,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{menupurviews,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{itempurviews,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update basic_purviewuser set userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modulepurviews = #{modulepurviews,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, menupurviews = #{menupurviews,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, itempurviews = #{itempurviews,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where pkid = #{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select pkid, userid, createtime, modulepurviews, menupurviews,itempurviews from basic_purviewuser
select pkid, userid, createtime, modulepurviews, menupurviews,itempurviews from basic_purviewuser WHERE userid=#{0} limit 1
